content.question: Which of the following key signatures indicates E major?

choices.label: The figure presents a bass clef key signature with three flats.
The figure presents a bass clef key signature with three sharps.
The figure presents a bass clef key signature with four sharps.
The figure presents a bass clef key signature with five sharps.

content.answer: The figure presents a bass clef key signature with four sharps.

unit.text: 1: Music Fundamentals I - Pitch, Major Scales and Key Signatures, Rhythm, Meter, and Expressive Elements

skill.text: Skill 2.A: Use symbols and terms to describe features of pitch in notated music, including pitch patterns and relationships, melodic features, chords, harmonic progressions, and cadences.
